title: Strategies for Enhancing Social Presence in Blended Synchronous Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Tool Proficiency and Fundamental Knowledge in Social Sciences
context.additional_context: Blended learning conducted using real-time video conferencing tools in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones. Aims to enhance social sector job competencies for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners effectively express social presence at over 80% proficiency through real-time interaction in a blended synchronous learning environment.
Learners identify at least three communication barriers in online-face-to-face hybrid group activities and suggest improvement strategies.
Learners successfully complete collaborative outcomes by applying social presence enhancement strategies through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
